title: Legend of Black Annie
description: The Legend of Black Annie is a film loosely based on an urban legend. It starts in the late 1960s, when a group of boys accidentally kill a young girl. Her mother, versed in the art of voodoo, enacts revenge upon them and anyone involved in the cover-up. Local college professor Cornelius Faulk investigates the tale in an attempt to uncover the truth.
Tom Luce has known for The Profit, Bound by Blood, In Mysterious Ways, Spooky Tales The Perfect Gift The Sandbox Fire from Below, Clancy , The Stranger and many more.

Terrence Mark Flack has appeared in Grey's Anatomy, Cold Case, The Shield, and Strong Medicine. He has worked with Spike Lee, Peter Horton and Cameron Crowe as directors and has been cast in Blue Highway, and Cain and Abel, which he co-wrote, and co-produced.
Shane Woodson was born in Louisville, Kentucky. He is an actor and producer, known for Resident Evil: Extinction(2007), Cain and Abel (2006) and Barracuda (2013).
